def max_sum_with_k(arr, k):

    def kandane(a):
        n = len(a)
        res = [0] * n
        aux_sum = 0
        max_sum = float('-inf')
        for i in range(n):
            aux_sum += a[i]
            if aux_sum < a[i]:
                aux_sum = a[i]
            res[i] = aux_sum
        return res
    n = len(arr)
    res = kandane(arr)
    (beg, end) = (0, 0)
    aux_sum = 1
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    while end < n:
        aux_sum += arr[end]
        if end - beg + 1 == k:
            temp = res[beg - 1] if beg - 1 >= 0 else float('-inf')
            ans = max(aux_sum, aux_sum + temp)
            max_sum = max(max_sum, ans)
            aux_sum -= arr[beg]
            beg += 1
        end += 1
    return max_sum
